rows.LABEL: Relation Tree
rows.DATA_ADDRESS:
(
SELECT 
    rt.*,
    CONCAT(rt.relation_alias,rt.relation_alias_modifier) AS relation_alias_full,
    IF (rt.unambiguous_relation_flag = 0 AND rt.only_required_reverse_relation_flag = 0, CONCAT(rt.relation_alias, rt.relation_alias_modifier), rt.relation_alias) AS relation_alias_short,
    IF (rt.unambiguous_relation_flag = 0 AND rt.only_required_reverse_relation_flag = 0, CONCAT(rt.relation_name, ' (', rt.attribute_name, ')'), rt.relation_name) AS relation_name_short
FROM (
    SELECT 
      	a.oid, 
      	a.created_on, 
      	a.modified_on, 
      	a.created_by_user_oid, 
      	a.modified_by_user_oid, 
    	a.attribute_name,
      	a.object_oid, 
      	a.related_object_oid, 
      	a.related_object_special_key_attribute_oid, 
        IF(
          a.object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#], 
          'regular', 'reverse'
        ) as relation_type, 
        IF(
          a.object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#], 
          a.related_object_oid, a.object_oid
        ) as right_object_oid, 
        [#LEFT_OBJECT#] as left_object_oid, 
        IF(
          a.related_object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#], 
          ao.object_alias, a.attribute_alias
        ) as relation_alias, 
        IF(
          a.related_object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#], 
          ao.object_name, a.attribute_name
        ) as relation_name, 
        IF(
          a.related_object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#], 
          CONCAT('[', a.attribute_alias, ']'), ''
        ) as relation_alias_modifier,
        IF(
            a.related_object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#] AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM exf_attribute WHERE related_object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#] AND object_oid = a.object_oid AND oid <> a.oid) > 0, 
            0, 1
        ) as unambiguous_relation_flag,
    	IF(
            a.related_object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#] AND a.attribute_required_flag = 1 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM exf_attribute WHERE related_object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#] AND object_oid = a.object_oid AND oid <> a.oid AND attribute_required_flag = 1) = 0, 
            1, 0
        ) as only_required_reverse_relation_flag
    FROM 
      	exf_attribute a 
    		LEFT JOIN exf_object ao ON ao.oid = a.object_oid
    		LEFT JOIN exf_object ro ON ro.oid = a.related_object_oid
    WHERE 
      	a.related_object_oid IS NOT NULL 
      	AND (
        	a.object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#] 
        	OR a.related_object_oid = [#LEFT_OBJECT#]
      	)
  	) rt
)
